MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.30pm to remove a generator from our Princes road and Kings Drive substations and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:23PM on Sunday 21 March 2021.
